entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
